name: Lemon Mango Tea Sangria
description: A family-friendly version of a Spanish summer favourite.

ingredients.name: apple juice, peach or grape juice
peeled and sliced fresh fruit (berries, oranges, kiwi, pears or apples)
apple juice, peach or grape juice

preparation: Freeze juice in ice cube trays.
Boil Lemon Mango Herbal Tea and water in Multipurpose Pot over medium heat for 7 minutes. Strain into a pitcher and allow to cool before refrigerating.
Before serving, add ice cubes, fruit and juice to pitcher. Serve in chilled glasses.
